level.heading: Effect of judgment or order.
level.text: A judgment or order against an unincorporated nonprofit association shall not by itself [be] a judgment or order against a member or manager.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 10 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act).
